com.impinj.octanesdk

Class SectorConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.impinj.octanesdk.SectorConfig

  • public class SectorConfig
extends Object
    Contains sector configuration for xArray. This class contains the configuration for a single sector of the xArray. xArray antennas are organized into sectors for ease of use by the application
    Author:
    impinj

        txPowerinDbm - desired power for the sector antennas

        Defines the receive sensitivity in dBm (e.g. -55 dBm).
        Parameters:
        rxSensitivityinDbm - the desired receive sensitivity for the sector antennas

      • getRxSensitivityInDbm

        Returns:
        the current receive sensitivity for the sector antennas

      • setMaxRxSensitivity

        public void setMaxRxSensitivity(boolean maxRxSensitivity)
        Specifies that the maximum antenna receive sensitivity setting should be used.
        Parameters:
        maxRxSensitivity - true for all sector antennas to use max sensitivity

      • isMaxRxSensitivity

        public boolean isMaxRxSensitivity()
        Returns:
        true if all sector antennas are using max sensitivity

      • setMaxTxPower

        public void setMaxTxPower(boolean maxTxPower)
        Specifies that the maximum antenna transmit power setting should be used.
        Parameters:
        maxTxPower - true to have all sector antennas use max transmit power

      • getMaxTxPower

        Returns:
